page.title: 16FARMING
page.content: Farms on Ashton Common are grassland with more silage than hay;dairy and beef,employing family labour only. Bullen Hill farm also runs daily milk delivery Steeple Ashton and district. Bought in milk.Loppinger farm arable, sheep,beef bought in,family labour. Bartletts farm main income farm contract work.Family labour. Planning permission sought for houses in farmyard area.Farms at Keevil dairy and arable,one growing maize for silage.East Town farm arable.Home farm Rood Ashton beef, arable.Spiers Piece farm beef and arable.Dairy herd sold because of E.E.C. milk quota imposition.Arable crops winter wheat, winter barley,winter oil seed rape, lupins,spring barley, potatoes. Two intensive chicken units.One man market garden enterprise Pheasants reared for shoot,most farms keep a few poultry.
